thread.title: Colleges Waste No Time Offering Moorer
thread.title_full: Colleges Waste No Time Offering Moorer

author: info@scout.com (Corey Bender)
title: Colleges Waste No Time Offering Moorer
text:
Join Share & Embed Colleges Waste No Time Dishing out Offers to Donnovan Moorer, a Freshman Wide Receiver out of the IMG Academy Corey Bender 11:15 AM / Originally published on Scout Football WINDERMERE, Fla. -- Donnovan Moorer, a 2020 pass catcher at the talent-loaded IMG Academy, is now at double-digit scholarship offers after receiving good news from UCLA on Monday. 
Evaluation Notes: 
Moorer will obviously have to pack on weight and strengthen up his frame over the next three years, but there's no doubting his playmaking ability when the pigskin is in his hands. This is an elusive slot receiver that does a good job of sticking his foot in the ground and winning those one-on-one battles in the open field. 
Moorer shows that field-stretching speed when dissecting his film, but it's his quickness and slippery style of play that catches your attention in a hurry. He does a nice job of stopping on a dime and creating space between him and the defender. 
Size is not on Moorer's side, but he certainly takes advantage of his strengths once the ball is tossed his way. 
Programs Mentioned in Video:
